description:
Made with a durable, breathable blend of natural merino wool and organically sourced cotton, the Central Classic Short Sleeve Tee Icebreaker Story is a go-to piece for everyday comfort. Forward-set shoulder seams reduce friction when you're wearing a pack or on the go.

Inspired by nature, Icebreaker harnesses the performance qualities of natural fibres to offer an alternative to clothing based on petrochemical synthetics. Merino is an annually renewable fibre that naturally resists odours, keeps you cool when it’s hot and warm when it’s not, and lets your skin breathe for comfort all day, every day.
name: Icebreaker Central Classic SS Tee - Icebreaker Story - Mens
